recipe_name: Baked scallops with sunblush tomatoes and chilli
author: Maria Elia
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Return the scallop meat to the cleaned shells and scatter over the remaining ingredients.  Place the scallop shells onto a baking tray and bake in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until the scallops are cooked through. (NB: The scallops are cooked through when the flesh is opaque.) Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 scallops, cleaned,  2 scallop shells, cleaned,  3 sunblush tomatoes, chopped,  2 spring onions, trimmed, chopped,  ½ lime, juice only,  ½ red chilli, seeds removed, chopped,  1 tbsp soy sauce
